live_updates: This issue has been resolved.  Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
39487.summary: Some customers in the Rossmere area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
39487.title: July 13 – Winnipeg (Rossmere) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
39488.summary: Some customers in the Woodbine area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
39488.title: July 13 – Calgary (Woodbine) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
